pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Whatify_ToolkitWelcome to Whatify Toolkit## Installation:`pip3 install toolkit_w``pip3 install pytest==5.4.2``pip3 install allure-pytest==2.8.14``pip3 install s3fs==0.4.2``pip3 install boto3==1.10.39`## Usage:```import toolkit_w as my_toolmyWhatify = my_tool.MyWhatify()myWhatify.login(USER, PASSWORD)```
